sourceDesc.p: Auckland Council Libraries GLNZ C28.10 (Grey New Zealand letters).

front.p: 1887 August 8 Undated: Grey was in Napier 8-9 August 1887, and Colenso’s huia bill paper had been published in the 1886 Trans.: to Grey Auckland Council Libraries GLNZ C28.10 (Grey New Zealand letters).

body.p: In returning from seeing you this morning I recollected having a copy left of my paper in “Trans. N.Z. Inst.” vol. XIX (this year’s) containing the huia beak, &c., which we spoke of, and I have thought of sending this copy to you,—which please accept. You may find time to look into it “between the watches”!
